name: Protect the Egg
description:
You are an Egg monster trying to escape from Monsterworld. Do not Let other monsters constrain your potential. Use your Mouse to Keep Moving!!

The fourth 1hgj game of Team Awesome is here to spook you. All artwork was generated using Interactive Image Translation with pix2pix-tensorflow (https://affinelayer.com/pixsrv/index.html), while sounds come from open sources.
